item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Private financing firms are expanding their infrastructure debt teams as Singapore pushes to reduce carbon emissions across the region, notably Southeast Asia. Global Infrastructure Partners LP, the private markets unit of BlackRock Inc., recently hired Saul Raccah as managing directo...
